tool.name: WisecondorX convert
tool.command: @pipefail@ ln -f -s $bam.metadata.bam_index input.bam.bai && ln -f -s $bam input.bam && printf "Creating 5kb bins for file $bam.element_identifier" && WisecondorX convert input.bam output.npz

param.name: bam
param.label: Bam input
param.help: input Bam is converted in .npz file

tool.help:
wisecondorx_npz_converter ============================
Generate npz file from bam file.
Inputs --------
A bam file
